definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
(of a girl) to lose one's virginity/to deflower a virgin/to reach the age of 16/(of a man) to reach the age of 64
newly hatched bird/fig. inexperienced person/fig. chick (slighting term for young woman)/bimbo
early evening/wedding night/(fig.) first sexual encounter
the queen of flowers (refers esp. to plum blossom)/(fig.) nickname for a famous beauty or courtesan
to break the hymen/to lose virginity
erhua variant of 窯姐|窑姐[yao2 jie3]
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
to lose one's virginity/to lose one's chastity
to pick flowers/to enter houses at night in order to rape women
to receive guests/to receive patrons (of prostitutes)
